features.title: All features for your university life
features.description: Neuland Next offers all the tools you need for a successful study at THI

schedule.title: Schedule & Exams
schedule.description: Your personal schedule from PRIMUSS and your exams at a glance. Choose between a convenient multiday-view and a clear list view.

navigation.title: Campus Navigation
navigation.description: Find available rooms, view buildings or explore the campus. Use our smart suggestions to find rooms between lectures.

canteen.title: Mensa
canteen.description: View the mensa menu, including prices, allergens and nutritional information, even with support for personal preferences. Supports the official mensa, Reimanns, Canisius - Convent and the mensa in Neuburg.

events.title: Campus Events
events.description: Don't miss any important events! Stay informed about THI career events, university sports, campus festivals and other exciting activities. Your personal event calendar for an active campus life.

description.part1: Neuland Next is 100% developed on a voluntary basis by Neuland Ingolstadt e.V.
description.part2: We offer students a platform to exchange ideas, realize projects and expand their knowledge. Together we develop projects for students, participate in competitions and organize events around computer science.

testimonials.title: What our users say
testimonials.description: Over 4000 THI students already trust Neuland Next.

reviews.content: The customizable timetable helps me a lot in my daily routine. The room suggestions between lectures are really useful, especially when you're not yet familiar with all the buildings.
reviews.author: Daniel S.

reviews.content: The event overview is extremely useful. Whether it's campus events, sports activities, or important university dates, everything is available at a glance and even includes a direct link to the campus map.
reviews.author: Leonie R.

reviews.content: I really like the cafeteria overview, especially when you don't have much time between lectures. The app also keeps you really well informed about events.
reviews.author: Kevin P.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Here you'll find answers to the most important questions about Neuland Next.

questions.question: Is it secure to use Neuland Next?
questions.answer: Of course! We take security very seriously. Neuland Next is built with the latest technologies and follows best practices for security and privacy. We do not store any personal data on our servers. All data is stored locally on your device and is not shared with third parties.

questions.question: What happens to my login credentials?
questions.answer: To access your data, you need to log in with your THI credentials. Your credentials are stored securely on your device and are not shared with us or any third parties. On iOS, your credentials are stored in the secure keychain, and on Android, they are encrypted with the Android Keystore. This allows you to access your data without having to log in every time.

questions.question: Are you commissioned by the THI?
questions.answer: No, we are not affiliated with the Technische Hochschule Ingolstadt or commissioned to develop the app. Neuland Ingolstadt e.V. is a non-profit organization founded by students of the THI. We are independent of the university and develop the app in our free time. The university is aware of our project and gives us access to the official API to communicate with the university servers.

download.title: Get Started Now
download.description: Neuland Next is available for iOS and Android. No suitable device? Use the web version!

contributing.title: Become Part of Neuland Next!
contributing.description: Whether you're a developer, designer, tester, or just curious ‚Äì we welcome any support!

troubleshooting.title: Help & Troubleshooting
troubleshooting.description: Having issues with the app or questions about usage? Here you'll quickly find the right support.

footer.description: The unofficial app for THI, developed by students for students. Open Source and community-driven.
